name: JMR Technologies
description:
JMR Technologies is a software house specializing in Python & Microsoft .NET
Our team consists of more than 20 people, mostly developers and designers who approach each project with passion and full commitment. JMRâ€™s core business is web application development but also we have completed many mobile and desktop applications.
For almost 10 years of existence on the market, we have completed over 100 projects for clients all over the world including USA, England, France, Italy, China, Switzerland and Poland.
We have a lot of experience in working with startups. Our full-stack team is ready to design and develop any kind of web application and help our clients to bring their innovative ideas to reality.
